question: hey guys whats up ive been smoking pot for a while now but have latley been doing allot for this past month so far for the last 3 weeks ive smoked evrey day..but the last 3 or 4 days my blood sugar has been going low every time i smoke..it has gotten so bad about 2 days ago i passed out while i was high because of my low blood sugar.im just wondering if theres a reason for this or if its just because of im not maneging my diabetes properly before i smoke.
title: any reason my blood sugar has been going low latley when i smoke pot?
